author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tiruvalluvar Day was celebrated at the Tiruvalluvar Government Arts College here on Saturday.

Teachers and students, led by T. R. Ganesan, College Principal, garlanded the statue of the saint-poet Tiruvalluvar on the college campus. Mr. Ganesan administered an oath to the students to propagate Tirukkural wherever and whenever possible.

Students participated in elocution, essay writing and painting contests.
title: Tiruvalluvar Day celebrated
